func:

msg['db'] = 'iotp_kqqhst_default_2018-03-14'
msg['searchName'] = 'by-eventTypeAndMac'

msg['descending'] = true

return msg

name: set result to flow
set token len
set token len
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let token = msg.payload
let ar = token.split(':')
if(ar.length !== 6){
    msg['check'] = 0
}else{
    msg['check'] = 1
    actInfo['grp'] = ar[0]
    actInfo['ts'] = ar[1]
    actInfo['userId'] = ar[2]
    actInfo['cpId'] = ar[3]
    actInfo['roleId'] = ar[4]
    actInfo['dataset'] = ar[5]
    msg['actInfo'] = actInfo
}
msg['dataset'] = actInfo.dataset
return msg

name: set info to insert
func:
// let obj = flow.get('actInfo')
let obj = msg['actInfo']
let newPayload = {}
let infoObj = {}

obj['type'] = Number(obj.type)
infoObj['id'] = obj.id
infoObj['type'] = Number(obj.type)
newPayload['information'] = infoObj
newPayload['name'] = obj.name
newPayload['_id'] = obj.id
if(obj.data !== undefined)
  newPayload['data'] = obj.data
newPayload['createTs'] = Date.now()
newPayload['createDt'] = new Date()    

msg.payload = newPayload
return msg

name: get status
get status by event
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let url = 'http://127.0.0.1:1886/event?token={token}&fport={fport}&macAddr={macAddr}&limit=1'
url = url.replace('{token}', encodeURIComponent(actInfo.token)).replace('{fport}',actInfo.fport).replace('{macAddr}', msg.payload.macAddr)
msg['url'] = url
msg['meta'] = msg.payload
return msg

name: set val to payload
combine val 162
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let newMsg = ''
let checkCnt = 6
for(let i = 0 ; i < msg.payload.length ; i++){
  checkCnt = checkCnt + parseInt(msg.payload[i].val)
  newMsg = newMsg + '0'+msg.payload[i].val
}
actInfo['message'] = '06'+newMsg+'0'+checkCnt.toString(16)
msg['actInfo'] = actInfo
return msg

name: combine val 163
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
/*
let delayInfo = msg.payload
let delayTime = 1000
if(delayInfo['responseCode'] == '000'){
  let props = delayInfo['props']
  delayTime = parseInt(props[0]['p_value'])
}
msg['msgDelay'] = delayTime
msg['msgPreviousDelay'] = 0
*/
let newMsg = ''
for(let i = 0 ; i < msg.payload.length ; i++){
  newMsg = newMsg + msg.payload[i].val
}
actInfo['message'] = newMsg
msg['actInfo'] = actInfo
return msg

name: get dlCnt
set dlCnt
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let dlCnt = 10
let newMsgArray = []
let newMsg = {}
let extra = {}
if(msg.payload !== null){
  let tmpCnt = parseInt(msg.payload)+1
  if(tmpCnt <= 99)
    dlCnt = tmpCnt
}
newMsg['macAddr'] = msg['mac']
newMsg['data'] = dlCnt + actInfo['message']
newMsg['id'] = msg['gwid']
newMsg['recv'] = new Date()
extra['port'] = 2
extra['txpara'] = '22'
extra['fport'] = actInfo.fport
newMsg['extra'] = extra
newMsgArray.push(newMsg)
msg['dlCnt'] = dlCnt
actInfo['message'] = newMsgArray
msg['actInfo'] = actInfo
return msg

name: set cache
func:
let newPayload = []
newPayload.push(msg['macId'])
newPayload.push(msg['dlCnt'])
msg.payload = newPayload
return msg

    actInfo['userId'] = ar[2]
    actInfo['cpId'] = ar[3]
    actInfo['roleId'] = ar[4]
    actInfo['dataset'] = ar[5]
    msg['actInfo'] = actInfo
    msg['roleId'] = actInfo['roleId']
}
return msg

name: set payload to mqtt
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let newMsgArray = []
let newMsg = {}
let extra = {}
let topicArray = msg.topic.split('/')
let gwid = topicArray.length >= 2 ? topicArray[2] : 'NA'
newMsg['macAddr'] = actInfo['mac']
newMsg['data'] = actInfo['message']
newMsg['id'] = gwid
newMsg['recv'] = new Date()
extra['port'] = 2
extra['txpara'] = '22'
extra['fport'] = actInfo.fport
newMsg['extra'] = extra
newMsgArray.push(newMsg)
actInfo['message'] = newMsgArray
return msg

name: combine val 168
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let newMsg = ''
for(let i = 0 ; i < msg.payload.length ; i++){
  let biStr = ('0' + parseInt(msg.payload[i].val).toString(2)).slice(-2)
  newMsg = newMsg + biStr
}
newMsg = '000000'+newMsg
newMsg = parseInt(newMsg, 2).toString(16)
newMsg = '0'+newMsg
actInfo['message'] = newMsg
msg['actInfo'] = actInfo
let url = 'http://127.0.0.1:1886/event?token={token}&fport={fport}&macAddr={macAddr}&limit=1'
url = url.replace('{token}', encodeURIComponent(actInfo.token)).replace('{fport}',actInfo.fport).replace('{macAddr}', msg.payload[0].macAddr)
msg['url'] = url
return msg

name: check len and set topic
set payload to switch
func:
let newPayload = []
let data = {}
data['macAddr'] = msg.payload.macAddr
data['time'] = new Date()
data['data'] = msg.payload.val+'0'
data['channel'] = 000000000
data['sf'] = 9
data['gwip'] = '127.0.0.1'
data['gwid'] = '0000000000000000'
data['repeater'] = '00000000ffffffff'
data['systype'] = 1
data['rssi'] = 0
data['snr'] = 0
data['snr_max'] = 0
data['snr_min'] = 0
data['fport'] = 169
newPayload.push(data)
msg.payload = newPayload
return msg

name: set to obj
set frameCnt
set keepAlive
func:
let keepAlive = '1'
let newMessage = '0000'
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let macObj = msg['macObj']
let newPayload = []
let cmd = {}
let extra = {}
let data = ''
if(msg.payload.responseCode == '000'){
  if(msg.payload.total > 0){
    let event = msg.payload.data[0]
    keepAlive = event.information.keepAlive
  }
}
keepAlive = parseInt(keepAlive, 10).toString(16)
keepAlive = ('0000'+keepAlive).slice(-4)
newMessage = (newMessage+actInfo.message).slice(-4)
data = newMessage+keepAlive
extra['port'] = 1
extra['txpara'] = '22'
extra['fport'] = actInfo.fport
cmd['extra'] = extra
cmd['macAddr'] = macObj['mac']
cmd['data'] = data
cmd['recv'] = new Date()
cmd['id'] = getRandomNumber(1000)
newPayload.push(cmd)
actInfo['message'] = newPayload
msg['actInfo'] = actInfo
return msg
function getRandomNumber(quantity_of_nums){
   var milliseconds = new Date().getMilliseconds()
   return Math.floor(milliseconds * quantity_of_nums / 1000)
}

name: set delay
func:
let delayTime = 0
let delayInfo = msg.payload
if(delayInfo['responseCode'] == '000'){
  let props = delayInfo['props']
  delayTime = parseInt(props[0]['p_value'])
  msg['msgPreviousDelay'] = 0
}
msg['msgDelay'] = delayTime

return msg

name: Increment the delay
set payload to split
func:
let actInfo = msg['actInfo']
let macArray = actInfo['mac']
let msgArray = actInfo['message']
let dlArray = []
for(let i = 0 ; i < macArray.length ; i++){
  let tmp = {}
  tmp['mac'] = macArray[i]
  tmp['msg'] = msgArray[i]
  dlArray.push(tmp)
}
msg.payload = dlArray
return msg

name: check tagInfo
func:
let dlObj = msg['dlObj']
let tagInfo = msg.payload
let msgObj = dlObj['msg']
let dlFlg = false
if(tagInfo['period_report_timer'] != msgObj['period_report_timer'] || tagInfo['normal_channel'] != msgObj['normal_channel'] || tagInfo['trigger_channel'] != msgObj['trigger_channel']){
  dlFlg = true     
}
msg['dlFlg'] = dlFlg
return msg

name: set info to update
func:
// let obj = flow.get('actInfo')
let obj = msg['actInfo']
let newPayload = msg.payload[0]
let infoObj = msg.payload[0].information
infoObj['type'] = Number(obj.type)
newPayload['information'] = infoObj
newPayload['name'] = obj.name
if(obj['data'] !== undefined)
  newPayload['data'] = obj['data']
newPayload['updateTs'] = Date.now()
newPayload['updateDt'] = new Date()
msg.payload = newPayload
return msg
